title: Levelling Up In An Exclusive Dungeon - Novel Updates
tags: Demi-Humans   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Game Elements   Hunters   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Wizards
author: 가온길
description:
There’s not a lot of hunting grounds, but there are too many hunters!

It’s a difficult world to catch monsters if you don’t have money or connections.

As I was washing my hands one day, a dungeon suddenly appeared in front of me.

The dungeon was right in my loft!

I’ll become stronger by monopolizing EXP and rewards in my dungeon that only I know of!>
